stitch and front post stitches materials yarn i chose to use cotton yarn in a worsted aran weight to make this mandala as gauge isn t important any brand or weight of yarn will be fine to complete your mandala you will use less than 50g of each colour the colours below are just a guide please feel free to change the colours used and use your own colourways i d love to see your creations #sweetposymandala  paintbox yarns rico creative drops paris cotton aran cotton aran a banana cream vanilla light yellow 621 62 19 b candyfloss pink rose light light pink 650 00 57 c pistachio green pastel green light mint green 625 67 21 d racing green pistachio moss green 628 41 25 e light champagne nature off white 603 60 17 f raspberry pink smokey berry dark old pink 644 12 60 hook use any hook suitable for the yarn you choose personally i prefer the stitches on my mandalas to be more defined and i always use a 4mm hook with worsted weight yarn for my mandalas other you will need a darning needle and scissors to cut your ends and weave in the ends finished size finished mandala measures approx 30cm if you change yarn weight or hook size this will vary © zoe ellison / confessions
